extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Confluence Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the Confluence instance is running a version prior to 8.9.1 for Data Center or prior to 8.5.9 LTS and 7.19.22 LTS for Server.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Confluence
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to Confluence Data Center version 8.9.1 or later, or Confluence Server version 8.5.9 LTS or 7.19.22 LTS.

cve_id: Confluence Data Center and Server Vulnerability
affected_products: Confluence Data Center: Versions prior to 8.9.1
Confluence Server: Versions prior to 8.5.9 LTS and 7.19.22 LTS
